sentences.text: NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS To Be Held On April 25, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are cordially invited to attend the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders (the Meeting) of APARTMENT INVESTMENT AND MANAGEMENT COMPANY (Aimco or the Company) to be held on Tuesday, April 25, 2017, at 8:30 a.m. at Aimcos corporate headquarters, 4582 South Ulster Street, Suite 1100, Denver, CO 80237, for the following purposes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. To elect seven directors, for a term of one year each, until the next Annual Meeting of Stockholders and until their successors are elected and qualify;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. To ratify the selection of Ernst & Young LLP, to serve as independent registered public accounting firm for the Company for he fiscal year ending December 31, 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. To conduct an advisory vote on executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To conduct an advisory vote on the frequency of future advisory votes on executive compensation; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. To transact such other business as may properly come before the Meeting or any adjournment(s) thereof
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only stockholders of record at the close of business on February 24, 2017, will be entitled to notice of, and to vote at, the Meeting or ny adjournment(s) thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are again pleased to take advantage of Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) rules that allow issuers to furnish proxy materials to their stockholders on the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe these rules allow us to provide our stockholders with the information they need, while lowering the costs of delivery and reducing the environmental impact of our Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On or about March 14, 2017, we intend to mail our stockholders a notice containing instructions on how to access our 2016 proxy statement (the Proxy Statement), Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016, and 2016 Corporate Citizenship Report and vote online.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The notice also provides instructions on how you can request a paper copy of these documents if you desire, and how you can enroll in e-delivery.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received your annual materials via email, the email contains voting instructions and links to these documents on the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: WHETHER OR NOT YOU EXPECT TO BE AT THE MEETING, PLEASE VOTE AS SOON AS POSSIBLE TO ENSURE THAT YOUR SHARES ARE REPRESENTED.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: BY ORDER OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lisa R. Cohn
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lisa R. Cohn Secretary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APARTMENT INVESTMENT AND MANAGEMENT COMPANY 4582 SOUTH ULSTER STREET, SUITE 1100 DENVER, COLORADO 80237
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROXY STATEMENT FOR ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS TO BE HELD ON APRIL 25, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors (the Board) of Apartment Investment and Management Company (Aimco or the Company) has made these proxy materials available to you on the Internet, or, upon your request, has delivered printed versions of these materials to you by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are furnishing this Proxy Statement in connection with the solicitation by our Board of proxies to be voted at our 2017 Annual Meeting (the Meeting), and at any and all adjournments or postponements thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Meeting will be held on Tuesday, April 25, 2017, at 8:30 a.m. at Aimcos corporate headquarters located at 4582 South Ulster Street, Suite 1100, Denver, Colorado 80237.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to rules adopted by the SEC, we are providing access to our proxy materials over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, we are sending a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials (the Notice) to each stockholder entitled to vote at the Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The mailing of such Notice is scheduled to begin on or about March 14, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All stockholders will have the ability to access the proxy materials over the Internet and request a printed copy of the proxy materials by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instructions on how to access the proxy materials over the Internet or to request a printed copy may be found in the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Notice includes instructions on how stockholders may request proxy materials in printed form by mail or electronically by email on an ongoing basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This solicitation is made by mail on behalf of Aimcos Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Costs of the solicitation will be borne by Aimco.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further solicitation of proxies may be made by telephone, fax or personal interview by the directors, officers and employees of the Company and its affiliates, who will not receive additional compensation for the solicitation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has retained the services of Alliance Advisors LLC, for an estimated fee of $10,000, plus out-of-pocket expenses, to assist in the solicitation of proxies from brokerage houses, banks, and other custodians or nominees holding stock in their names for others.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company will reimburse banks, brokerage firms and other custodians, nominees and fiduciaries for reasonable expenses incurred by them in sending proxy material to stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of record of the Class A Common Stock of the Company (Common Stock) as of the close of business on the record date, February 24, 2017 (the Record Date), are entitled to receive notice of, and to vote at, the Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each share of Common Stock entitles the holder to one vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the close of business on the Record Date, there were 157,017,376 shares of Common Stock issued and outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether you are a stockholder of record or hold your shares through a broker or nominee (i.e., in street name) you may direct your vote without attending the Meeting in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder of record, you may vote via the Internet by following the instructions in the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you request printed copies of the proxy materials by mail, you may also vote by signing your proxy card and returning it by mail or by submitting your vote by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You should sign your name exactly as it appears on the proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are signing in a representative capacity (for example, as guardian, executor, trustee, custodian, attorney or officer of a corporation), you should indicate your name and title or capacity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are the beneficial owner of shares held in street name, you may be eligible to vote your shares electronically over the Internet or by telephone by following the instructions in the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you request printed copies of the proxy materials by mail, you may also vote by signing the voter instruction card provided by your bank or broker and returning it by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you provide specific voting instructions by mail, telephone or the Internet, your shares will be voted by your broker or nominee as you have directed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The persons named as proxies are officers of Aimco.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All proxies properly submitted in time to be counted at the Meeting will be voted in accordance with the instructions contained therein.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you submit your proxy without voting instructions, your shares will be voted in accordance with the recommendations of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies may be revoked at any time before voting by filing a notice of revocation with the Corporate Secretary of the Company, by filing a later dated proxy with the Corporate Secretary of the Company or by voting in person at the Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are entitled to attend the Meeting only if you were an Aimco stockholder or joint holder as of the Record Date or if you hold a valid proxy for the Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are not a stockholder of record but hold shares in street name, you should provide proof of beneficial ownership as of the Record Date, such as your most recent account statement prior to February 24, 2017, a copy of the voting instruction card provided by your broker, trustee or nominee, or other similar evidence of ownership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Brokers holding shares of record for customers generally are not entitled to vote on certain matters unless they receive voting instructions from their customers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner of shares and do not provide your broker, as stockholder of record, with voting instructions, your broker has authority under applicable stock market rules to vote those shares for or against routine matters at its discretion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the Meeting, the following matters are not considered routine: the election of directors, the advisory vote on executive compensation, and the advisory vote on the frequency of advisory votes on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where a matter is not considered routine, shares held by your broker will not be voted (a broker non-vote) absent specific instructions from you, which means your shares may go unvoted on those matters and not affect the outcome if you do not specify a vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The principal executive offices of the Company are located at 4582 South Ulster Street, Suite 1100, Denver, Colorado 80237.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 1:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ELECTION OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to Aimcos Articles of Restatement (the Charter) and Amended and Restated Bylaws (the Bylaws), directors are elected at each annual meeting of stockholders and hold office for one year, and until their successors are duly elected and qualify.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos Bylaws currently authorize a Board consisting of not fewer than three nor more than nine persons.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board currently consists of seven directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The nominees for election to the Board selected by the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee of the Board and proposed by the Board to be voted upon at the Meeting are:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Terry Considine    Kathleen M. Nelson Thomas L. Keltner    Michael A. Stein J. Landis Martin    Nina A. Tran Robert A. Miller
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the nominees were elected to the Board at the last Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Messrs. Keltner, Martin, Miller, and Stein and Mses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nelson and Tran are not employed by, or affiliated with, Aimco, other than by virtue of serving as directors of Aimco.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless authority to vote for the election of directors has been specifically withheld, the persons named in the accompanying proxy intend to vote for the election of Messrs. Considine, Keltner, Martin, Miller, and Stein and Mses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nelson and Tran to hold office as directors for a term of one year until their successors are elected and qualify at the next Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All nominees have advised the Board that they are able and willing to serve as directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any nominee becomes unavailable for any reason (which is not anticipated), the shares represented by the proxies may be voted for such other person or persons as may be determined by the holders of the proxies (unless a proxy contains instructions to the contrary).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In no event will the proxy be voted for more than seven nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In an uncontested election at the meeting of stockholders, any nominee to serve as a director of the Company will be elected if the director receives a vote of the majority of votes cast, which means that the number of shares voted for a director exceeds the number of votes against that director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to a contested election, a plurality of all the votes cast at the meeting of stockholders will be sufficient to elect a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a nominee who currently is serving as a director receives a greater number of against votes for his or her election than votes for such election (a Majority Against Vote) in an uncontested election, Maryland law provides that the director would continue to serve on the Board as a holdover director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, under Aimcos Bylaws, any nominee for election as a director in an uncontested election who receives a Majority Against Vote is obligated to tender his or her resignation to the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee of the Board for consideration.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee will consider any resignation and recommend to the Board whether to accept it.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is required to take action with respect to the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committees recommendation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of the election of directors, abstentions or broker non-votes as to the election of directors will not be counted as votes cast and will have no effect on the result of the vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless instructed to the contrary in the proxy, the shares represented by the proxies will be voted FOR the election of the seven nominees named above as directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS RECOMMENDS A VOTE FOR EACH OF THE SEVEN NOMINEES.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 2:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RATIFICATION OF SELECTION OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The firm of Ernst & Young LLP, the Companys independent registered public accounting firm for the year ended December 31, 2016, was selected by the Audit Committee to act in the same capacity for the year ending December 31, 2017, subject to ratification by Aimcos stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The aggregate fees billed for services rendered by Ernst & Young LLP during the years ended December 31, 2016 and 2015, are described below under the heading Principal Accountant Fees and Services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In selecting and overseeing the Companys independent auditor, the Audit Committee considers, among other things
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ernst & Young LLPs historical and recent performance on the Aimco audit, including the results of an internal survey of Ernst & Young LLPs service and quality;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: External data relating to audit quality and performance, including recent Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB) reports on Ernst & Young LLP and its peer firms;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The appropriateness of Ernst & Young LLPs fees;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ernst & Young LLPs tenure as Aimcos independent auditor and its familiarity with Aimcos operations and business, accounting policies and practices and internal control over financial reporting;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The depths of Ernst & Young LLPs capabilities and resources to support our business in the areas of accounting, auditing, internal control over financial reporting, tax and related matters; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ernst & Young LLPs independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on this evaluation, the Audit Committee believes that Ernst & Young LLP is independent and that it is in the best interests of Aimco and our stockholders to retain Ernst & Young LLP to serve as our independent auditor for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives of Ernst & Young LLP, including the lead engagement partner, who has served in such role for the previous two years, will be present at the Meeting and will be given the opportunity to make a statement if they so desire and to respond to appropriate questions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast regarding the proposal is required to ratify the selection of Ernst & Young LLP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions or broker non-votes will not be counted as votes cast and will have no effect on the result of the vote on the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless instructed to the contrary in the proxy, the shares represented by the proxies will be voted for the proposal to ratify the selection of Ernst & Young LLP to serve as the Companys independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS RECOMMENDS A VOTE FOR THE RATIFICATION OF THE SELECTION OF ERNST & YOUNG LLP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 3:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ADVISORY VOTE ON EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to Section 14A of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, we provide our stockholders with the opportunity to vote to approve, on a nonbinding, advisory basis, the compensation of our named executive officers (NEOs) as disclosed in this proxy statement in accordance with the compensation disclosure rules of the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since the 2011 annual meeting of stockholders, the Board has asked stockholders for an annual advisory vote on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At Aimcos 2016 Annual Meeting of Stockholders, approximately 98% of the votes cast in the advisory vote on executive compensation that were present and entitled to vote on the matter were in favor of the compensation of Aimcos NEOs (also commonly referred to as Say on Pay) as disclosed in Aimcos 2016 proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation and Human Resources Committee (the Committee) and management were pleased with these results and remain committed to extensive engagement with stockholders as part of their ongoing efforts to formulate and implement an executive compensation program designed to align the long-term interests of our executive officers with our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016 and early 2017, we engaged with stockholders representing nearly two-thirds of shares of Common Stock outstanding as of September 30, 2016, as part of our annual process of soliciting feedback on Aimcos executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has continued to receive broad support from stockholders on the structure of its executive compensation program, the programs alignment of pay and performance, and the quantum of compensation delivered under the program as described in detail under the heading Compensation Discussion & AnalysisStockholder Engagement Regarding Executive Compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As described in detail under the heading Compensation Discussion & Analysis, we seek to align closely the interests of our NEOs with the interests of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation program is designed to reward our NEOs for the achievement of short-term and long-term strategic and operational goals and the achievement of total shareholder return (TSR) greater than peers, while at the same time avoiding the encouragement of unnecessary or excessive risk-taking.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Here are further details of the Aimco program:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All members of the Committee are independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee has established a thorough process for the review and approval of Aimcos executive compensation program, including amounts awarded to executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee engages and receives advice from an independent, third-party compensation consultant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee selects a peer group of companies to compare Aimcos compensation of executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco sets target total cash compensation and target total compensation near the median of corresponding targets among the peer group, both as a measure of fairness and also to provide an economic incentive to remain with Aimco.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with Aimcos pay-for-performance philosophy, actual compensation is based on Aimcos results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco does not provide executives with more than minimal perquisites, such as reserved parking space
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco does not maintain or contribute to any defined benefit pension plan, supplemental pension plan or nonqualified deferred compensation plan for its executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive officers participate in Aimcos 401(k) plan on the same terms as available to all Aimco team members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco does not maintain any employment or severance agreements with its executive officers (other than for Mr. Considine, who was required to have an employment agreement in connection with Aimcos initial public offering in 1994; the agreement was amended in 2008).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos compensation program, which, among other things, includes caps on cash compensation, shared performance metrics across the organization, multiple performance metrics that align with Aimcos publicly communicated business strategy, the use of long-term incentive (LTI) compensation that is based on TSR, and stock ownership guidelines with required holding periods after vesting, are aligned with the long-term interests of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with Aimcos pay-for-performance philosophy, Mr. Considines total compensation is highly variable from year to year, determined by Aimcos results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Considines base salary of $600,000 for 2016 has remained unchanged from 2006, and is well below the median for CEOs of his experience, expertise and tenure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One hundred percent of Mr. Considines 2016 target short-term
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: incentive (STI) compensation was at risk, based entirely on Aimcos performance against its corporate goals, as determined by the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One hundred percent of Mr. Considines LTI, which comprises over two-thirds of his target total compensation for 2016, is at risk, based on relative returns over a forward looking, three-year period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Here is how the Aimco program was applied in 2016:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With strong 2016 results, executive officers were awarded STI amounts that were above target amounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos 2016 performance highlights include the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco had 17.3% TSR in 2016, and outperformed the MSCI US REIT Index (REIT Index), the NAREIT Apartment Index, and the Standard & Poors 500 Total Return Index (S&P 500 Index), in each case, over the one-year, three-year, and five-year periods ended December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted Funds from Operations (AFFO) per share, which is Aimcos primary measure of current period performance, was $1.97, up 5% year-over-year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Economic Income, a measure of investment return representing the annual change in estimated Net Asset Value (NAV) per share (computed based on Aimcos third quarter 2016 NAV compared to Aimcos third quarter 2015 NAV) plus cash dividends per share, and Aimcos primary measure of long-term performance, was $7 per share, or a 15% return on NAV for the period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NAV per share increased by 12% to $52.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cash dividends per share increased by 12% to $1.32.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Same Store net operating income (NOI) was up 6.2%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco completed the lease-up of Vivo, located in Cambridge, MA, ahead of plan, and significantly outperformed its expectations for the lease-ups of One Canal, located in Boston, MA, and Indigo, located in Redwood City, CA.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The projected contribution to 2017 NOI from these lease-up communities is $0.13 per share, which is $0.01 per share greater than the Company had forecasted one year ago.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Investment of $582 million in three redevelopment communities that reached NOI stabilization in 2016 is estimated to have created value of $170 million, an amount equal to 30% of Aimcos investment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Average revenue per apartment home was up 8%, to $1,978.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The vote on this resolution is not intended to address any specific element of compensation; rather, the vote relates to the overall compensation of our NEOs, as described in this proxy statement in accordance with the compensation disclosure rules of the SEC.

sentences.text: The vote is advisory, which means that the vote is not binding on the Company, our Board or the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are asking the Companys stockholders to approve, on an advisory basis, the following resolution: RESOLVED, that the compensation of the named executive officers, as disclosed in the Companys Proxy Statement for the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders pursuant to Item 402 of SEC Regulation S-K, including the Compensation Discussion & Analysis, the 2016 Summary Compensation Table and the other related tables and disclosure, is hereby APPROVED.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS RECOMMENDS A VOTE FOR APPROVAL OF THE COMPENSATION OF OUR NAMED EXECUTIVE OFFICERS, AS DISCLOSED IN THIS PROXY STATEMENT.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 4:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ADVISORY VOTE ON THE FREQUENCY OF FUTURE ADVISORY VOTES ON EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act provides that stockholders must be given the opportunity to vote, on a non-binding, advisory basis, for their preference as to how frequently we should seek future advisory votes on the compensation of our NEOs as disclosed in accordance with the compensation disclosure rules of the SEC, which we refer to as an advisory vote on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By voting with respect to this Proposal 4, stockholders may indicate whether they would prefer that we conduct future advisory votes on executive compensation once every one, two, or three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders also may, if they wish, abstain from casting a vote on this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We currently hold an advisory vote on executive compensation every year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board continues to believe that an annual advisory vote on executive compensation will allow our stockholders to provide timely, direct input on the Companys executive compensation philosophy, policies and practices as disclosed in the proxy statement each year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that an annual vote remains consistent with the Companys efforts to engage in an ongoing dialogue with our stockholders on executive compensation and corporate governance matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company recognizes that stockholders may have different views as to the best approach for the Company, and therefore we look forward to hearing from our stockholders as to their preferences on the frequency of an advisory vote on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This vote is advisory and not binding on the Company or our Board in any way.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Board and the Compensation and Human Resources Committee will take into account the outcome of the vote when considering the frequency of future advisory votes on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board may decide that it is in the best interests of our stockholders and the Company to hold an advisory vote on executive compensation more or less frequently than the current recommendation of the Board or the frequency receiving the most votes cast by our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proxy card provides stockholders with the opportunity to choose among four options (holding the vote every one, two or three years, or abstaining) and, therefore, stockholders will not be voting to approve or disapprove the recommendation of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE MATTERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This chart provides a summary overview of Aimcos governance practices, each of which is described in more detail in the information that follows.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What Aimco Does Supermajority Independent Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The only member of management who serves on the Board is the Companys founder, chairman and chief executive officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Six of the seven members of the Board, or 85.7% of the Board members, are independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent Standing Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only independent directors serve on the standing committees, including Audit, Compensation and Human Resources, Nominating and Corporate Governance, and Redevelopment and Construction Services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Independent Director Serves on Each Standing Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To ensure that each independent director hears all information unfiltered and to ensure the most efficient functioning of the Board, each independent director serves on each standing committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lead Independent Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has a lead independent director who presides over regular independent director executive sessions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Refreshment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee has structured the Board such that there are directors of varying tenures and perspectives, with new directors joining the Board every few years, including in 2016, while retaining the institutional memory of longer-tenured directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Of the original independent directors on the Aimco Board, one remains.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During early 2016 a new director joined the Board, and later in the year a director of 16 years tenure left the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has added a new director roughly every 2.5 to 6 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Regular Access to and Involvement with Management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to regular access to management during Board and committee meetings, the independent directors have regular and direct access to members of management and to the Aimco business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This includes Mr. Millers involvement with site visits and analysis of redevelopment projects, Mr. Steins involvement with accounting and finance matters, Mr. Keltners involvement with compensation and personnel matters, Ms. Nelsons involvement with governance matters, and Mr. Martins involvement with agenda setting and board materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Engaged Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to regular access to management, the independent directors meet at least quarterly and receive written updates from Mr. Considine at least monthly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholder Engagement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the direction of the Board, including the participation of Board members when requested by stockholders, Aimco regularly engages with stockholders on governance, pay and business matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Stock Ownership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By the completion of five years of service, an independent director is expected to own, at a minimum, the lesser of 27,500 shares or shares having a value of at least $550,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risk Assessment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board conducts an annual risk assessment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Areas involving risk that are reported on by management and considered by the Board, include: operations, liquidity, leverage, finance, financial statements, the financial reporting process, accounting, legal matters, regulatory compliance, compensation and human resources.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Majority Voting with a Resignation Policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since inception, Aimcos directors have been elected annually, and Aimco requires its directors to be elected by a majority of the votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors failing to get a majority of the votes cast are expected to tender their resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Access.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following a 2015 stockholder vote in favor of proxy access and after extensive engagement with stockholders, the Board amended the Companys bylaws to provide proxy access.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A stockholder or a group of up to 20 stockholders, owning at least 3% of our shares for three years, may submit nominees for up to 20% of the Board, or two nominees, whichever is greater, for inclusion in our proxy materials, subject to complying with the requirements contained in our bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What Aimco Does Not Do Related Party Transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee maintains a related party transaction policy to ensure that Aimcos decisions are based on considerations only in the best interests of Aimco and its stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since the beginning of 2016 and to date, there have been no related person transactions that required review under the policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pledging or hedging shares held to satisfy stock ownership requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys insider trading policy places restrictions on the Companys directors and executive officers regarding entering into hedging transactions with respect to the Companys securities and from holding the Companys securities in margin accounts or otherwise pledging such securities as collateral for loans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pledging or hedging transactions are permitted only in very limited circumstances, and only with respect to shares held in excess of stock ownership requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No directors or executive officers have in place any hedging transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Interlocking Directorships.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Aimco director or member of Aimco management serves on a Board or a compensation committee of a company at which an Aimco director is also an employee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Overboard Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos corporate governance guidelines and committee charters limit the number of other boards and the number of other audit committees on which an Aimco director may serve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Retirement Age or Term Limits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rather than imposing arbitrary limits on service, the Company regularly (and at least annually) reviews each directors continued role on the Board and the need for periodic board refreshment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Staggered Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All Aimco directors have always been elected annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independence of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that to be considered independent, an outside director may not have a direct or indirect material relationship with Aimco or its subsidiaries (directly or as a partner, stockholder or officer of an organization that has a relationship with the Company).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A material relationship is one that impairs or inhibits, or has the potential to impair or inhibit, a directors exercise of critical and disinterested judgment on behalf of Aimco and its stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In determining whether a material relationship exists, the Board considers all relevant facts and circumstances, including whether the director or a family member is a current or former employee of the Company, family member relationships, compensation, business relationships and payments, and charitable contributions between Aimco and an entity with which a director is affiliated (as an executive officer, partner or substantial stockholder).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board consults with the Companys counsel to ensure that such determinations are consistent with all relevant securities and other laws and regulations regarding the definition of independent director, including but not limited to those categorical standards set forth in Section 303A.02 of the listing standards of the New York Stock Exchange as in effect from time to time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with these considerations, the Board affirmatively has determined that Messrs. Keltner, Martin, Miller, and Stein and Mses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nelson and Tran are independent directors (collectively the Independent Directors).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, no director attended fewer than 75% of the aggregate total number of meetings of the Board and each committee on which such director served.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other members of the Board are not required to attend such meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the members of the Board attended the Companys 2016 Annual Meeting of Stockholders, and the Company anticipates that all of the members of the Board will attend the Meeting this year.

sentences.text: Audit Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee currently consists of the Independent Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Stein serves as the chairman of the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has a written charter that is reviewed annually and was last amended in October 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to the work of the Audit Committee, Mr. Stein has regular and recurring conversations with Mr. Beldin, Aimcos Chief Financial Officer (CFO), Ms. Cohn, Aimcos General Counsel, Andrew Higdon, Aimcos Chief Accounting Officer, the head of Aimcos internal audit function, and representatives of Ernst & Young LLP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committees charter is posted on Aimcos website (www.aimco.com) and is also available in print to stockholders, upon written request to Aimcos Corporate Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to its charter, the Audit Committee is responsible for overseeing Aimcos accounting and financial reporting processes and audits of Aimcos financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is directly responsible for the appointment, compensation, and oversight of the independent auditors and the lead engagement partner and makes its appointment based on a variety of factors, including those described in Proposal 2.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among other matters, the Audit Committee also:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews the scope, and overall plans for and results of the annual audit and internal audit activities;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Oversees managements negotiation with Ernst & Young LLP concerning fees;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consults with management and Ernst & Young LLP with respect to Aimcos processes for risk assessment and risk management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Areas involving risk that are reported on by management and considered by the Audit Committee, the other Board committees, or the Board, include: operations, liquidity, leverage, finance, financial statements, the financial reporting process, accounting, legal matters, regulatory compliance, and human resources;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consults with management and Ernst & Young LLP and provides oversight for Aimcos financial reporting process, internal control over financial reporting, the Companys internal audit function and, in conjunction with the Board, the Companys enterprise risk management processes;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews and approves the Companys policy about the hiring of former employees of independent auditors providing service to the Company;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews and approves the Companys policy for the pre-approval of audit and permitted non-audit services by the independent auditor;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Receives reports pursuant to Aimcos policy for the submission and confidential treatment of communications from team members and others concerning accounting, internal control and auditing matters;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews and discusses quarterly earnings releases prior to their issuance and quarterly reports on Form 10-Q and annual reports on Form 10-K prior to their filing;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews the responsibilities and performance of the Companys internal audit function, approves the hiring, promotion, demotion or termination of the lead internal auditor, and oversees the lead internal auditors periodic performance review and changes to his or her compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews with management the scope and effectiveness of the Companys disclosure controls and procedures, including for purposes of evaluating the accuracy and fair presentation of the Companys financial statements in connection with the certifications made by the CEO and CFO;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meets regularly with members of Aimco management and with Ernst & Young LLP;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performs an annual review of the Companys independent auditor, including the lead engagement partner and the potential successors for that role, including an assessment of the firms experience, expertise, communication, cost, value, and efficiency; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Periodically evaluates independent audit service providers, including a 2015 request for proposal process to assess the best firm to serve as Aimcos independent auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation and Human Resources Committees purposes are to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Provide for succession planning in all leadership positions, both in the short term and the long term, with particular focus on CEO succession in the short term and the long term;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Oversee the Companys management of the talent pipeline process;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Oversee the goals and objectives of the Companys executive compensation plans;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annually evaluate the performance of the CEO;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Determine the CEOs compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review the decisions made by the CEO as to the compensation of the other executive officers;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approve and grant any equity compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consider the results of stockholder advisory votes on executive compensation and take such results into consideration in connection with the review and approval of executive officer compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review and discuss the Compensation Discussion & Analysis with management;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review compensation arrangements to evaluate whether incentive and other forms of pay encourage unnecessary or excessive risk taking;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review and approve the terms of any compensation clawback or similar policy or agreement between the Company and the Companys executive officers;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review periodically the goals and objectives of the Companys executive compensation plans, and amend, or recommend that the Board amend, these goals and objectives if appropriate; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Oversee the Companys culture, with a particular focus on collegiality, collaboration and team-building
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One of the most important responsibilities of the Compensation and Human Resources Committee is to ensure a succession plan is in place for key members of the Companys executive management team, including the CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the work of the Compensation and Human Resources Committee, the Board has a succession plan for the CEO position, is prepared to act in the event of a CEO vacancy in the short term, and has identified candidates for succession over the long term.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board will select the successor taking into consideration the needs of the organization, the business environment, and each candidates skills, experience, expertise, leadership and fit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company maintains a robust succession planning process, as highlighted in the following chart.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management Succession The Company maintains an executive talent pipeline for every executive officer position, including the CEO position, and every other officer position within the organization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The executive talent pipeline includes interim, ready now, and under development candidates for each position.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has an intentional focus on those formally under development for executive roles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is also focused on attracting, developing and retaining strong talent across the organization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The executive talent pipeline is formally updated annually and is the main topic of at least one of the Compensation and Human Resources Committees meetings each year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation and Human Resources Committee also reviews the pipeline in connection with year-end performance and compensation reviews for every executive officer position.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The pipeline is discussed regularly at the management level, as well.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Talent development and succession planning is a coordinated effort among the CEO, the Compensation and Human Resources Committee, and the Companys Human Resources team, as well as each succession candidate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is provided exposure to succession candidates for executive officer positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Multiple internal succession candidates have been identified for the CEO position.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each CEO succession candidate has been with Aimco at least 11 years and has at least 15 years of industry experience and at least six years of executive management experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All executive succession candidates have formal development plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All CEO succession candidates receive one-on-one development from a professional executive coach.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All CEO succession candidates receive annual 360-degree feedback.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Considine provides formal updates to the Compensation and Human Resources Committee annually, and informal updates at least quarterly, on CEO succession candidates development plan progress.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The executive coach provides formal updates to the Compensation and Human Resources Committee annually, and informal updates more frequently, on CEO succession candidates development plan progress.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company maintains a forward-looking approach to succession.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Positions are filled considering the business strategy and needs at the time of a vacancy and the candidates skills, experience, expertise, leadership and fit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has a proven track record on succession, for example with the CFO and Chief Accounting Officer transitions in 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews each Board members suitability for continued service as a director when his or her term expires and when he or she has a change in professional status and recommends whether or not the director should be re-nominated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Develops and recommends to the Board a set of corporate governance principles applicable to Aimco and its management;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Maintains a related party transaction policy and oversees any potential related party transactions;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Oversees a systematic and detailed annual evaluation of the Board, committees and individual directors in an effort to continuously improve the function of the Board; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Considers corporate governance issues that may arise and develops appropriate recommendations, including providing the forum for the Board to consider important matters of public policy and vet stockholder input on a variety of issues.

sentences.text: Board Composition, Board Refreshment and Director Tenure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee selects nominees for director based on, among other things, breadth and depth of experience, knowledge, skills, expertise, integrity, ability to make independent analytical inquiries, understanding of Aimcos business environment and willingness to devote adequate time and effort to Board responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In considering nominees for director, the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee seeks to have a diverse range of experience and expertise relevant to Aimcos business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee places a premium on directors who work well in the collegial and collaborative nature of the Board (which is also consistent with the Aimco culture) and yet also requires directors who think and act independently and can clearly and effectively communicate their convictions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee assesses the appropriate balance of criteria required of directors and makes recommendations to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee has specifically considered the feedback of some stockholders as well as the discussions of some commentators that suggest lengthy Board tenure should be balanced with new perspectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specific to Aimco, the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee has structured the Board such that there are directors of varying tenures, with new directors and perspectives joining the Board every few years while retaining the institutional memory of longer-tenured directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Longer- tenured directors, balanced with less-tenured directors, enhance the Boards oversight capabilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos directors work effectively together, coordinate closely with senior management, comprehend Aimcos challenges and opportunities, and frame Aimcos business strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos Board members have established relationships that allow the Board to apply effectively its collective business savvy in guiding the Aimco enterprise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When formulating its Board membership recommendations, the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee also considers advice and recommendations from others, including stockholders, as it deems appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such recommendations are evaluated based on the same criteria noted above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee will consider as nominees to the Board for election at next years annual meeting of stockholders persons who are recommended by stockholders in writing, marked to the attention of Aimcos Corporate Secretary, no later than July 1, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, no Aimco stockholder (other than the existing directors) expressed interest in serving on the Board or recommended anyone to serve on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is responsible for nominating members for election to the Board and for filling vacancies on the Board that may occur between annual meetings of stockholders.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nelson and Tran for re-election.

sentences.text: Board Leadership Structure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At this time, Aimcos Board believes that combining the Chairman and CEO role is most effective for the Companys leadership and governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Having one person as Chairman and CEO provides unified leadership and direction to the Company and strengthens the ability of the CEO to develop and implement strategic initiatives and respond efficiently in various situations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board also believes the combination of Chairman and CEO positions is appropriate in light of the independent oversight provided by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco has a Lead Independent Director, currently Mr. Martin, who in this capacity:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Presides over executive sessions of independent directors, which are held regularly and not less than four times per year;

sentences.text: Serves as a liaison between the chairman and independent directors;

sentences.text: Helps frame and approves meeting agendas and schedules;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Regularly calls meetings of independent directors; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Is available for direct communication with stockholders.

sentences.text: Majority Voting for the Election of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In an uncontested election at the meeting of stockholders, any nominee to serve as a director of the Company will be elected if the director receives a majority of votes cast, which means that the number of shares voted for a director exceeds the number of shares voted against that director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to a contested election, a plurality of all the votes cast at the meeting of stockholders will be sufficient to elect a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a nominee who currently is serving as a director receives a greater number of against votes for his or her election than votes for such election (a Majority Against Vote) in an uncontested election, Maryland law provides that the director would continue to serve on the Board as a holdover director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, under Aimcos Bylaws, any nominee for election as a director in an uncontested election who receives a Majority Against Vote is obligated to tender his or her resignation to the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee for consideration.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee will consider any resignation and recommend to the Board whether to accept it.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is required to take action with respect to the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committees recommendation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional details are set out in Article II, Section 2.03 (Election and Tenure of Directors; Resignations) of Aimcos Bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Access
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At our 2015 annual meeting, a proxy access stockholder proposal received the support of a majority of the votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: That proposal requested that the Board to adopt a bylaw that would require the Company to include in its proxy materials nominees for director proposed by a stockholder or group that owns at least 3% of our outstanding shares for at least three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following that meeting, through the summer and fall of 2015 and into 2016, we engaged in extensive stockholder outreach and discussed proxy access with stockholders representing over 66% of shares of Common Stock outstanding as of September 30, 2015, including all 10 of Aimcos largest stockholders as of that date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although our stockholders expressed varying views on proxy access generally, and on the specific terms of a proxy access bylaw, many stockholders indicated that they viewed proxy access as an important stockholder right.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the same time, many stockholders expressed concern that stockholders with a small economic interest could abuse proxy access and impose unnecessary costs on the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In particular, stockholders expressed support for a reasonable limit on the number of stockholders who could come together to form a nominating group, with a consensus around a 20 stockholder limit, so long as certain related funds were counted as one stockholder for this purpose.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, many stockholders expressed support for the principle that a proxy access bylaw provide for a minimum of two candidates, with that principle being more meaningful to stockholders than the percentage of the board used to calculate the number of permitted proxy access candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders expressed general flexibility concerning most other proxy access terms, including counting directors nominated as access candidates who are elected and re-nominated by the Board when determining the limit on access candidates for a limited number of years, and eliminating proxy access at the same annual
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: meeting for which a nomination notice outside of proxy access has been submitted by another stockholder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also, stockholders indicated that post-meeting holding requirements would be considered overly restrictive, but that a statement regarding post-meeting intentions that did not require continued ownership was acceptable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The feedback received from stockholders was reported to the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee and to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following a review of that feedback, corporate governance best practices and trends and the Companys particular facts and circumstances, the Board amended the Companys bylaws to provide a proxy access right to stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, a stockholder or a group of up to 20 stockholders, owning at least 3% of our shares for three years, may submit nominees for up to 20% of the Board, or two nominees, whichever is greater, for inclusion in our proxy materials, subject to complying with the requirements contained in our bylaws.

sentences.text: Code of Ethics
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has adopted a code of ethics entitled Code of Business Conduct and Ethics that applies to the members of the Board, all of Aimcos executive officers and all team members of Aimco or its subsidiaries, including Aimcos principal executive officer, principal financial officer and principal accounting officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Code of Business Conduct and Ethics is posted on Aimcos website (www.aimco. com) and is also available in print to stockholders, upon written request to Aimcos Corporate Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If, in the future, Aimco amends, modifies or waives a provision in the Code of Business Conduct and Ethics, rather than filing a Current Report on Form 8-K, Aimco intends to satisfy any applicable disclosure requirement under Item 5.05 of Form 8-K by posting such information on Aimcos website (www.aimco.com), as necessary.

sentences.text: Corporate Governance Guidelines and Director Stock Ownership
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has adopted and approved Corporate Governance Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These guidelines are available on Aimcos website (www.aimco.com) and are also available in print to stockholders, upon written request to Aimcos Corporate Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In general, the Corporate Governance Guidelines address director qualification standards, director responsibilities, the lead independent director, director access to management and independent advisors, director compensation, director orientation and continuing education, management succession, stock ownership guidelines and retention requirements, and an annual performance evaluation of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to stock ownership guidelines for the Independent Directors, the Corporate Governance Guidelines provide that by the completion of five years of service, an Independent Director is expected to own, at a minimum, the lesser of 27,500 shares or shares having a value of at least $550,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the Independent Directors has holdings well in excess of this amount, with the exception of Ms. Tran who joined the Board on March 1, 2016.

sentences.text: AUDIT COMMITTEE REPORT TO STOCKHOLDERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee oversees Aimcos financial reporting process on behalf of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management has the primary responsibility for the financial statements and the reporting process, including internal control over financial reporting and disclosure controls and procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A written charter approved by the Audit Committee and ratified by the Board governs the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fulfilling its oversight responsibilities, the Audit Committee reviewed the audited financial statements in the Annual Report on Form 10-K with management, including a discussion of the quality, not just the acceptability, of the accounting principles, the reasonableness of significant judgments, and the clarity of disclosures in the financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee reviewed with the independent registered public accounting firm, which is responsible for expressing an opinion on the conformity of those audited financial statements with accounting principles generally accepted in the United States, its judgment as to the quality, not just the acceptability, of the Companys accounting principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also has discussed with the independent registered public accounting firm the matters required to be discussed by Auditing Standard No. 1301, Communications with Audit Committees, issued by the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Audit Committee has received from the independent registered public accounting firm the written disclosures and letter required by Public Company Accounting Oversight Board Ethics and Independence Rule 3526, has discussed with the independent registered public accounting firm its independence from the Company and its management, and has considered whether the independent registered public accounting firms provision of non-audit services to the Company is compatible with maintaining such firms independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee discussed with the Companys independent registered public accounting firm the overall scope and plans for its audit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee meets with the independent registered public accounting firm, with and without management present, to discuss the results of its examination, its evaluation of the Companys internal control over financial reporting, and the overall quality of the Companys financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee held five meetings during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: None of the Audit Committee members have a relationship with the Company that might interfere with the exercise of the members independence from the Company and its management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In reliance on the reviews and discussions referred to above, the Audit Committee recommended to the Board, and the Board has approved, that the audited financial statements and managements report on internal control over financial reporting be included in the Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016, for filing with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has also determined that provision by Ernst & Young LLP of other non-audit services is compatible with maintaining Ernst & Young LLPs independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee and the Board have also recommended, subject to stockholder ratification, the selection of Ernst & Young LLP as the Companys independent registered public accounting firm for the year ending December 31, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee Pre-Approval Policies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has adopted the Audit and Non-Audit Services Pre-Approval Policy (the Pre-approval Policy).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A summary of the Pre-approval Policy is as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Pre-approval Policy describes the Audit, Audit-related, Tax and Other Permitted services that have the general pre-approval of the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pre-approvals are typically subject to a dollar limit of $50,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The term of any general pre-approval is generally 12 months from the date of pre-approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At least annually, the Audit Committee reviews and pre-approves the services that may be provided by the independent registered public accounting firm without obtaining specific pre-approval from the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As set forth in the Pre-approval Policy, unless a type of service has received general pre-approval and is anticipated to be within the dollar limit associated with the general pre-approval, it will require specific pre-approval by the Audit Committee if it is to be provided by the independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For both types of pre-approval, the Audit Committee will consider whether such services are consistent with the rules on independent registered public accounting firm independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee will also consider whether the independent registered public accounting firm is best positioned to provide the most effective and efficient service, for reasons such as its familiarity with Aimcos business, people, culture, accounting systems, risk profile and other factors, and whether the service might enhance Aimcos ability to manage or control risk or improve audit quality.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All such factors will be considered as a whole, and no one factor will necessarily be determinative.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the services described in the Principal Accountant Fee section above were approved pursuant to the annual engagement letter or in accordance with the Pre-approval Policy; none were approved pursuant to Rule 2-01(c)(7)(i)(C) of SEC Regulation S-X.

sentences.text: Stockholder Engagement Regarding Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At Aimcos 2016 Annual Meeting of Stockholders, approximately 98% of the votes cast in the advisory vote on executive compensation that were present and entitled to vote on the matter were in favor of the compensation of Aimcos NEOs (also commonly referred to as Say on Pay) as disclosed in Aimcos 2016 proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation and Human Resources Committee (the Committee) and management were pleased with these results, and remain committed to extensive engagement with stockholders as part of their ongoing efforts to formulate and implement an executive compensation program designed to align the long-term interests of our executive officers with our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016 and early 2017, we engaged with stockholders representing nearly two-thirds of shares of Common Stock outstanding as of September 30, 2016, as part of our annual process of soliciting feedback on Aimcos executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following chart summarizes the feedback we received, and what actions we have taken in response.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What Aimco Heard      How Aimco Responded Overall Program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has continued to receive broad support from stockholders on the structure of its executive compensation program, the programs alignment of pay and performance, and the quantum of compensation delivered under the program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company is making no changes to the structure of the program, and is continuing its long-standing practice of setting target total compensation near the median of target total compensation for the Companys peers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Disclosure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders appreciate the disclosure, and encouraged Aimco to continue to disclose the connection between metrics and incentives.

sentences.text: Overview of Aimcos Pay-for-Performance Philosophy and 2016 Performance Results
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco is a pay-for-performance organization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco starts by setting target total compensation near the median of target total compensation for Aimcos peers as identified on page 37, both as a measure of fairness and also to provide an economic incentive to remain with Aimco.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Actual compensation is determined based on Aimcos results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Every officers annual cash incentive compensation, or STI, is based in part on Aimcos performance against its annual corporate goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The more senior level the officer, the greater the percentage of his or her STI that is based on Aimcos performance against its corporate goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos LTI compensation follows a similar tiered structure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Every officers LTI is based in part on relative returns, with executive officers having a greater share of their LTI based on relative returns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the case of Mr. Considine, his entire LTI award is at risk based on Aimcos relative returns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LTI is measured and vests over time, typically a period of four years, so that officers bear longer term exposure to decisions made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco also requires substantial equity holdings by executive officers in order to increase their alignment with stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco had 17.3% TSR in 2016.
