sentences.text: Summary of Executive Compensation Program and Governance Practices
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Below we summarize certain executive compensation program and governance practices  both the practices we have implemented to drive performance and the practices we avoid because we do not believe they would serve our stockholders long-term interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What Aimco Does Pays for performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A significant portion of executive pay is not guaranteed, but rather is at risk and tied to key financial and value creation metrics that are disclosed to stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the incentive compensation (both STI and LTI) for Mr. Considine is subject to the achievement of various performance objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the other NEOs, all STI compensation, and two-thirds of target LTI compensation, is subject to the achievement of various performance objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Balances short-term and long-term incentives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The incentive programs provide an appropriate balance of annual and longer-term incentives, with LTI compensation comprising a substantial percentage of target total compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Uses multiple performance metrics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These mitigate the risk of the undue influence of a single metric by utilizing multi-year vesting for equity awards, multiple performance measures, and different performance measures for STI and LTI.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Caps award payouts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Amounts or shares that can be earned under the STI plan and LTI plan are capped.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Uses market-based approach for determining NEO target pay.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Target compensation for NEOs is set near the median for peer comparators.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee reviews the peer comparator group annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Maintains share ownership guidelines and holding periods after vesting until ownership guidelines are met.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has the following minimum share ownership requirements: CEO  lesser of five times base salary or 150,000 shares; CFO  lesser of five times base salary or 75,000 shares; and other executive officers  lesser of four times base salary or 25,000 shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All officers meet these requirements except for Mr. Beldin, who held approximately 23,000 shares at the time of his election to executive officer, now holds 40,422 shares, and is expected to be in compliance by 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Includes double-trigger change in control provisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Equity awards include double trigger provisions requiring both a change in control and a subsequent termination of employment (other than for cause) for accelerated vesting to occur.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Uses an independent compensation consulting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company engages an independent compensation consulting firm that specializes in the REIT industry.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee engages a separate independent compensation consultant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Maintains a clawback policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of a financial restatement resulting from misconduct by an executive, the clawback policy allows the Company to recoup incentive compensation paid to the executive based on the misstated financial information.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The policy covers all forms of bonus, incentive and equity compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Conducts a risk assessment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee annually conducts a compensation risk assessment to determine whether the compensation policies and practices, or components thereof, create risks that are reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Acts through an independent Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee consists entirely of independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What Aimco Does Not Do Guarantee salary increases, bonuses or equity grants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company does not guarantee annual salary increases or bonuses to anyone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has no guaranteed commitments to grant any equity-based awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Provide excise tax gross-up payments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company will not enter into any new contractual agreements that include excise tax gross-up payments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reprice options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has never repriced or otherwise reduced the per-share exercise price of any outstanding stock options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Repricing of stock options is not permitted under the 2015 Stock Award and Incentive Plan (the 2015 Plan) without first obtaining approval from the stockholders of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company and the Committee will not reprice underwater options without the consent of the Companys stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pay dividends or dividend equivalents on unearned performance shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance share award agreements do not provide for the payment of dividends until the shares are earned.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dividends accrue during the performance period and are paid on earned shares at the time of vesting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Provide more than minimal personal benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company does not provide executives with more than minimal perquisites, such as reserved parking spaces.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Total compensation for Aimcos executive officers is comprised of the following components:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LTI compensation directly ties the interests of executives to the interests of our stockholders, and comprises a substantial proportion of compensation for the NEOs, as follows:

sentences.text: CEO Pay Overview
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee determines the compensation for Mr. Considine.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Considines target total compensation for 2016 approximated the median for CEOs at Aimcos peers as discussed on page 37.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee devised a compensation plan for Mr. Considine that is approximately 11% base salary, 21% based on Aimcos performance against its corporate goals, and 68% based on relative TSR, making more of Mr. Considines target compensation tied to TSR than most of his peers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Considines target compensation mix is illustrated as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents

sentences.text: How the Committee determines the amount of target total compensation for executive officers
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to reviewing the performance of, and determining the compensation for, the CEO, the Committee also reviews the decisions made by the CEO as to the compensation of Aimcos other executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Base salary, target STI, and target LTI are generally set near the median base salary, target STI, and target LTI for peer comparators.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In particular, target total compensation for executives relatively new to their positions is set below the median, and target total compensation for seasoned executives is set near the median.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How peer comparators are identified
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco considers enterprise Gross Asset Value (GAV), as reported by Green Street Advisors, to be an imprecise, but reasonable representation of the complexity of a real estate business and of the responsibilities of its leaders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to GAV, Aimco also reviews other factors, including gross revenues, number of properties, and number of employees, to determine if these factors provide any additional insight into the size and complexity factors of its analysis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on this analysis, Aimco included as peers for 2016 compensation the following 20 real estate companies:

sentences.text: For Mr. Kimmel, whose position as Executive Vice President, Property Operations, does not have a good benchmark outside of the multi-family industry, Aimco included as peers for 2016 compensation the following eight multi-family real estate companies: AvalonBay Communities, Inc., Camden Property Trust, Essex Property Trust, Equity Residential, Home Properties, Inc., Mid-America Apartment Communities, Inc., Post Properties, Inc., and UDR, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These multi-family companies provide a useful benchmark for Mr. Kimmels position.

sentences.text: Risk analysis of Aimcos compensation programs
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee considers risk-related issues when making decisions with respect to executive compensation and has determined that neither Aimcos executive compensation program nor any of its non-executive compensation programs create risk-taking incentives that are reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on the organization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos compensation programs align with the long-term interests of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos Compensation Program Discourages Excessive Risk-Taking Limits on STI.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation of executive officers and other team members is not overly weighted toward STI.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Moreover, STI is capped.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Use of LTI.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LTI is included in target total compensation for all officers and typically vests over a period of four years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The vesting period encourages officers to focus on sustaining Aimcos long-term performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive officers with more responsibility for strategic and operating decisions have a greater percentage of their target total compensation allocated to LTI.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LTI is capped at two times target, or 200%, for the CEO, and 1.67 times target, or 167%, for other NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos Compensation Program Discourages Excessive Risk-Taking Stock ownership guidelines and required holding periods after vesting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos stock ownership guidelines require all executive officers to hold a specified amount of Aimco equity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any executive officer who has not yet satisfied the stock ownership requirements for his or her position must retain LTI after its vesting until stock ownership requirements are met.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These policies ensure each executive officer has a substantial amount of personal wealth tied to long-term holdings in Aimco stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shared performance metrics across the organization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A portion of STI for all officers and corporate team members is based upon Aimcos performance against its publicly communicated corporate goals, which are core to the long-term strategy of Aimcos business and are reviewed and approved by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One hundred percent of Mr. Considines STI, and 50% of the STI for the other NEOs, is based upon Aimcos performance against its corporate goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, having shared performance metrics across the organization is consistent with Aimcos focus on a collegial and collaborative team environment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LTI based on TSR.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A portion of LTI for all officers is based on relative returns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The more senior level the officer, the greater the percentage of LTI that is based on relative returns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One hundred percent of Mr. Considines LTI, and a substantial proportion of the LTI for the other NEOs, is based on relative returns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Multiple performance metrics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco had eight corporate goals for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, through Aimcos performance management program, Managing Aimco Performance, or MAP, which sets and monitors performance objectives for every team member, each team member has several different individual performance goals that are set at the beginning of the year and approved by management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the NEOs other than Mr. Considine (whose individual goals were identical to Aimcos corporate goals) had an average of eight individual goals for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Having multiple performance metrics inherently reduces excessive or unnecessary risk-taking, as incentive compensation is spread among a number of metrics rather than concentrated in a few.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Total Compensation for 2016
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, total compensation is the sum of base compensation, STI and LTI.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Base Compensation for 2016
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, Mr. Considines base compensation was $600,000, and has been unchanged from 2006.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, base compensation for all other NEOs was set between $350,000 and $400,000, near the median base compensation paid by peer comparators for similar positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Short-Term Incentive Compensation for 2016
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee determined Mr. Considines STI by the extent to which Aimco met eight designated corporate goals, which are described below and are referred to as Aimcos Key Performance Indicators, or KPI.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the other NEOs, calculation of STI is determined by the following two components, each representing 50% of the target STI: Aimcos performance against the KPI; and each individual officers achievement of his or her MAP goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, if an executives target STI is $400,000, then 50% of that amount, or $200,000, varies based on KPI results and 50% of that amount, or $200,000, varies based on MAP results.

sentences.text: For all numeric goals, the target performance metrics were Aimcos 2016 budget goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco has a rigorous budgeting process that includes an evaluation of prior performance, market data, and peer performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos budget strategy is to set ambitious, achievable goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos 2016 performance  which included conventional Same Store revenue and NOI growth of 4.7% and 6.2%, respectively, and 17.3% TSR  is a reflection of Aimcos effective and successful budgeting strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An explanation of the objective of each goal and performance levels and payouts for each goal is set forth in the paragraphs below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Same Store NOI Achievement (30% of KPI).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The primary objective of this goal was to fulfill Aimcos strategic objective of producing above-average operating results through focus on customer satisfaction, resident retention, and superior cost control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, the range for the Same Store NOI achievement goal was as follows: Threshold equated to achievement of three percent unfavorable to 2016 budgeted Same Store NOI; Target equated to achievement of 2016 budgeted Same Store NOI; and Maximum equated to three percent favorable to 2016 budgeted Same Store NOI.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos Same Store NOI achievement for 2016 was 0.12% unfavorable to budgeted Same Store NOI.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This resulted in a payout on the Same Store NOI achievement goal of 29.40% for each of the NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lease-Up of Three Newly Constructed Communities (10% of KPI).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The primary objective of this goal was to achieve underwritten leasing pace for the lease-ups of Vivo, One Canal, and Indigo.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, the range for the lease-up goal was as follows: Threshold equated to leased percentage one month or less behind the budgeted leased percentage; Target equated to leased percentage at the budgeted leased percentage; and Maximum equated to leased percentage one month or more ahead of budget.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, Aimco completed the lease-up of Vivo two months ahead of budget, and completed the year several months ahead of budget for the lease-ups of both One Canal and Indigo, as discussed in more detail on page 32.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This resulted in a payout on the lease-up goal of 20.00% for each of the NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Customer Satisfaction Scores (5% of KPI).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The primary objective of this goal was to enhance customer satisfaction, a key component of Aimcos strategic objective of producing above-average operating results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco customers are surveyed at several touch points in the customer lifecycle through Aimcos partnership with a third-party company that administers customer surveys on behalf of many companies in the real estate industry.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos customer satisfaction score for the full year consisted of the average score across all surveys covering six different touch points for overall satisfaction, on a scale of 1 to 5.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, the range for the resident satisfaction scores goal was as follows: Threshold equated to a 4.00; Target equated to a 4.10; and Maximum equated to a 4.25.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These ranges were set higher for 2016 than for 2015, during which Threshold, Target, and Maximum equated to a 3.95, a 4.0, and a 4.10, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, Aimcos customer satisfaction score, from approximately 85,000 survey responses, was 4.18, resulting in a payout of 7.67% for each of the NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Redevelopment and Development Investment and Returns, and Transactions That Improve Aimcos Portfolio Quality (10% of KPI).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The primary objective of this goal was to fulfill Aimcos strategic objectives for redevelopment and development and for portfolio management, two of Aimcos five areas of strategic focus.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Large and/or complex redevelopment and development projects provided increased weighting toward the total goal weighting of 10%, with smaller scale projects provided lower weighting toward the total goal weighting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Achievement for each project was determined with reference to the 2016 budgeted investment and scope for the project, and was based on the extent to which the project work was completed on time and within budget, as well as expected returns on investment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, Aimco completed the development of One Canal, made solid progress on its multi-year redevelopment projects, and started redevelopments at four communities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The project work was on time and within budget.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Leasing in 2016 achieved average rents at or above underwriting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, Aimco acquired the limited partners interest in two consolidated real estate partnerships that own seven low-income housing tax credit communities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With these acquisitions, Aimco now controls the real estate and entity decisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This resulted in a payout of 20.00% for each of the NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Leverage Ratios and Other Balance Sheet Activities Adding Financial Flexibility (5% of KPI).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The primary objective of this goal was to fulfill Aimcos strategic objective of maintaining a safe, flexible balance sheet with abundant liquidity and the capacity to take advantage of opportunities created by a future real estate down-cycle.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Achievement was based on the ratio of Debt and Preferred Equity to Adjusted EBITDA and balance sheet activities that added financial flexibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos ratio of Debt and Preferred Equity to Adjusted EBITDA for 2016 was 6.7x, down from 6.8x for 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, Aimco amended its $600 million revolving credit facility, extending its maturity to January 2022.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Borrowings under the credit agreement will bear interest at LIBOR plus 1.20%, a savings of 15 basis points from the prior facility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco lowered its weighted average cost of debt capital by closing $394 million of fixed-rate, amortizing property loans that have a weighted average term to maturity of 9.4 years and a blended interest rate of 3.19%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco also took advantage of the favorable interest rate environment and put refunding plans in place for $89 million of its 2017 property debt maturities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This resulted in a payout on the balance sheet goal of 8.00% for each of the NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AFFO Per Share (30% of KPI).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The primary objective of the AFFO goal was to increase Aimcos current period performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Funds from Operations (FFO) is a commonly used measure of REIT performance, which the National Association of Real Estate Investment Trusts (NAREIT) defines as net income, computed in accordance with GAAP, excluding gains from sales of, and impairment losses recognized with respect to, depreciable property, plus depreciation and amortization, and after adjustments for unconsolidated partnerships and joint ventures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco computes FFO in accordance with the guidance set forth by NAREIT.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pro forma FFO represents FFO as defined above, excluding preferred equity redemption related amounts (adjusted for non-controlling interests).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Preferred equity redemption related amounts (gains or losses) are items that periodically affect net income attributable to Aimco common stockholders computed in accordance with GAAP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco excludes preferred equity redemption related amounts (gains or losses) from its computation of Pro forma FFO because such amounts are not representative of operating performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AFFO represents Pro forma FFO reduced by capital replacements (also adjusted for non-controlling interests) and is Aimcos primary measure of current period performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, the range for the AFFO goal was as follows: Threshold equated to $1.90 per share; Target equated to $2.00 per share, the 2016 budgeted amount; and Maximum equated to $2.10 per share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos AFFO was $1.98 per share.2
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This resulted in a payout on the AFFO per share goal of 27.00% for each of the NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Team Member Engagement Scores (5% of KPI).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The primary objective of this goal was to maintain a highly engaged, satisfied workforce, which drives stronger results across all of Aimcos areas of strategic focus.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Every team member is surveyed via a third-party, confidential survey on his or her annual anniversary of employment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The team member engagement score consists of the average of the responses to the questions that comprise the engagement index for all team members who complete the survey during the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, the range for team member engagement scores was as follows: Threshold equated to 4.00; Target equated to 4.25; and Maximum equated to 4.75.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These ranges were set higher for 2016 than for 2015, during which Threshold, Target, and Maximum equated to 3.50, 4.00, and 4.50, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, Aimcos team member engagement score was 4.19, resulting in a payout of 4.40% for each of the NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On-Site Team Engagement, Retention, and Efficiency (5% of KPI).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The primary objective of this goal was to maintain a highly engaged, stable workforce at our communities, enhanced by innovations in efficiency, all of which further Aimcos strategic objective of producing above-average operating results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Achievement was based on on-site team engagement scores, team member retention ratios, and efficiency gains.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco implemented a number of efficiencies in its leasing offices in 2016, while maintaining prior year levels of on-site team member retention.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On-site team member engagement remained steady at 4.18.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This resulted in a payout on the on-site engagement, retention, and efficiency goal of 6.00% for each of the NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Severance Arrangements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco has an executive severance policy that provides that Aimco shall seek stockholder approval or ratification of any future severance agreement for any senior executive officer that provides for benefits, such as lump-sum or future periodic cash payments or new equity awards, in an amount in excess of 2.99 times such executive officers base salary and bonus.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation and benefits earned through the termination date, the value of vesting or payment of any equity awards outstanding prior to the termination date, pro rata vesting of any other long-term awards, or benefits provided under plans, programs or arrangements that are applicable to one or more groups of employees in addition to senior executives are not subject to the policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It has been Aimcos longstanding practice not to enter into agreements with senior executives to provide excessive severance arrangements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Employment Arrangements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On July 29, 1994, as required in connection with Aimcos initial public offering, Aimco entered into an employment agreement with Mr. Considine.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On December 29, 2008, Aimco entered into an employment agreement with Mr. Considine to replace his 1994 employment agreement and the 2002 non-competition and non-solicitation agreement between Mr. Considine and Aimco.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2008 employment agreement was entered into to reflect current practice and update Aimcos agreement with Mr. Considine, which had not been formally revised since the Companys initial public offering in 1994, and to make the compensation arrangements compliant with certain Internal Revenue Service requirements, primarily Section 409A of the Code, which required documentary compliance by December 31, 2008.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In connection with the execution of the employment agreement, Mr. Considine did not receive any additional equity awards or signing bonus.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee evaluated the terms of Mr. Considines employment agreement in comparison to those of the CEOs of Aimcos peers and other comparable companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2008 employment agreement was for an initial five-year term, with automatic renewal for successive one-year terms until the year in which Mr. Considine reaches age 70, or 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2008 employment agreement eliminated the evergreen term in the prior employment agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Considines employment agreement provides for a base pay of not less than $600,000, subject to future increase.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Considine also continues to be eligible to participate in Aimcos performance-based incentive compensation plan with a target total incentive compensation amount of not less than $3.9 million, which may be paid in cash or in equity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, Mr. Considines target incentive opportunity was set at $5.025 million.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The employment agreement provides severance payments to Mr. Considine upon his termination of employment by Aimco without cause, by Mr. Considine for good reason and upon a termination for reason of disability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Considine is not entitled to any additional or special payments upon the occurrence of a change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Considines walk right under the 1994 employment agreement (that is, his right to severance payments upon his terminating employment with the Company within two years following a change in control) was eliminated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The definition of change in control was also narrowed to increase the required percentage of change in ownership and to require the occurrence of the applicable change in control event, rather than just stockholder approval of such event.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon termination of his employment by Aimco without cause, by Mr. Considine for good reason, or upon a termination for reason of disability, Mr. Considine is generally entitled to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) a lump sum cash payment equal to two times the sum of base salary at the time of termination and $1.65 million, subject to certain reductions, including a reduction of the sum by 1/24 for each complete month of employment following his attainment of age 68,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) any STI earned but unpaid for a prior fiscal year,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) a pro-rata portion of a $1.65 million STI amount for the fiscal year in which the termination occurs, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (d) immediate full acceleration of any outstanding unvested stock options and equity awards with certain limitations on the term thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of Mr. Considines death, the Company will pay or provide to Mr. Considines estate any earned but unpaid base salary and vested accrued benefits and any STI earned but unpaid for a prior fiscal year, and all equity-based and other LTI awards granted to Mr. Considine will become immediately fully vested and payable, as applicable, and all outstanding stock option awards will remain exercisable subject to certain limitations on the term thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the employment agreement, in the event payments to Mr. Considine are subject to the excise tax imposed by Section 4999 of the Code, Mr. Considine is entitled to receive a limited gross-up payment, subject to a maximum of $5 million.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If covered payments are less than 10% over the permitted limit, Mr. Considine is required to reduce his payments to avoid triggering a gross-up payment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the time the employment agreement was entered into, the limited gross-up payment was intended to balance the interests of Aimcos stockholders, eliminate the incentive for the early exercise of stock options and reflect competitive practice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The employment agreement also contains customary confidentiality provisions, a limited mutual non-disparagement provision, and on-competition, non-solicitation and no-hire provisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: None of Messrs. Beldin, Bezzant, or Kimmel or Ms. Cohn has an employment agreement or severance arrangement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The restricted stock and/or stock option agreements pursuant to which restricted stock and/or stock option awards have been made to Messrs. Considine, Beldin, Bezzant, Kimmel and Ms. Cohn provide that, upon a change in control, all outstanding shares of restricted stock shall not become immediately and fully vested and all unvested stock options shall not become immediately and fully vested and remain exercisable (along with all options already vested) for the remainder of the term of the option unless there is also a subsequent qualifying termination of employment of the executive officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Benefits; Perquisite Philosophy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos executive officer benefit programs are substantially the same as for all other eligible officers and employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco does not provide executives with more than minimal perquisites, such as reserved parking places.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Ownership Guidelines and Required Holding Periods After Vesting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco believes that it is in the best interest of Aimcos stockholders for Aimcos executive officers to own Aimco stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Every year, the Committee and Mr. Considine review Aimcos stock ownership guidelines, each executive officers holdings in light of the stock ownership guidelines, and each executive officers accumulated realized and unrealized stock option and restricted stock gains.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Equity ownership guidelines for all executive officers are determined as a minimum of the lesser of a multiple of the executives base salary or a fixed number of shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee and management have established the following stock ownership guidelines for Aimcos executive officers:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ownership Target Lesser of 5x base salary or 150,000 shares Lesser of 5x base salary or 75,000 shares Lesser of 4x base salary or 25,000 shares
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any executive who has not satisfied the stock ownership guidelines must, until the stock ownership guidelines are satisfied, hold 50% of after tax shares of restricted stock for at least three years from the date of vesting, and hold 50% of shares acquired upon option exercises (50% calculated after exercise price plus taxes) for at least three years from the date of exercise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of Messrs. Considine, Bezzant and Kimmel and Ms. Cohn exceed the ownership targets established in Aimcos stock ownership guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Beldin, promoted to Chief Financial Officer on September 14, 2015, does not yet meet the ownership targets, with holdings of 40,422 shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Beldin held approximately 23,000 shares at the time of his election to executive officer, and is expected to be in compliance by 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Role of Outside Consultants
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee has the authority under its charter to engage the services of outside advisors, experts and others to assist the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Committee engaged Board Advisory as its independent compensation consultant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the direction of the Committee, Board Advisory coordinated and consulted with Ms. Cohn and Ms. Johnson regarding executive compensation matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Advisory provided the Committee with an independent view of both market data and plan design.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco management has engaged FPL Associates, L.P. (FPL) to review Aimcos executive compensation plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Neither Board Advisory nor FPL provided other services to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee has assessed the independence of Board Advisory and FPL pursuant to SEC rules and has concluded that there are no conflicts of interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Base Salary, Incentive Compensation, and Equity Grant Practices
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Base salary adjustments typically take effect on January 1.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee (for Mr. Considine), and Mr. Considine, in consultation with the Committee (for the other executive officers), determine incentive compensation in late January or early February.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: STI is typically paid in February or March.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LTI is granted on a date determined by the Committee, typically in late January or in February.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco grants equity in three scenarios: in connection with incentive compensation, as discussed above; in connection with certain new-hire or promotion packages; and for purposes of retention.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to LTI, the Committee sets the grant date for the restricted stock and stock option grants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee sets grant dates at the time of its final compensation determination, generally in late January or in February.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The date of determination and date of award are not selected based on share price.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the case of new-hire packages that include equity awards, grants are made on the employees start date or on a date designated in advance based on the passage of a specific number of days after the employees start date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For non-executive officers, as provided for in the 2015 Plan, the Committee has delegated the authority to make equity awards, up to certain limits, to the Chief Financial Officer (Mr. Beldin) and/or Corporate Secretary (Ms. Cohn).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee and Mr. Beldin and Ms. Cohn time grants without regard to the share price or the timing of the release of material non-public information and do not time grants for the purpose of affecting the value of executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 Compensation Targets
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on comparison to compensation paid to CEOs at Aimcos peers, the Committee set Mr. Considines target total compensation (base compensation, STI and LTI) for 2017 at $6.125 million.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Considine set target total compensation (base compensation, STI and LTI) for 2017 for the other NEOs as follows: Mr. Beldin  $1.55 million; Mr. Bezzant  $1.03 million; Ms. Cohn  $1.9 million; and Mr. Kimmel  $1.45 million.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco performance will determine the amounts paid for 2017 STI and the portion of LTI awards that vest, and such amounts may be less than, or in excess of, these target amounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: STI will be paid in cash, and LTI was granted in January 2017 in the form of restricted stock, Long Term Incentive Plan units and/or stock options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) On January 25, 2016, the Committee made determinations of target total incentive compensation for 2016 based on achievement of Aimcos eight corporate goals for 2016, and achievement of specific individual objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Target total incentive compensation amounts were as follows: Mr. Considine  $5.025 million; Mr. Beldin  $950,000; Mr. Bezzant  $1.10 million; Ms. Cohn  $1.25 million; and Mr. Kimmel  $1.05 million.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: POTENTIAL PAYMENTS UPON TERMINATION OR CHANGE IN CONTROL
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the table and discussion that follows, payments and other benefits payable upon early termination and change in control situations are set out as if the conditions for payments had occurred and/or the terminations took place on December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In setting out such payments and benefits, amounts that had already been earned as of the termination date are not shown.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also, benefits that are available to all full-time regular employees when their employment terminates are not shown.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amounts set forth below are estimates of the amounts which could be paid out to the NEOs upon their termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The actual amounts to be paid out can only be determined at the time of such NEOs separation from Aimco.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Considines 2008 Employment Agreement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under his 2008 employment agreement, Mr. Considine is not entitled to any additional or special payments upon the occurrence of a change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Considines walk right under the 1994 employment agreement (that is, his right to severance payments upon his terminating employment with the Company within two years following a change in control) was eliminated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The definition of change in control was also narrowed to increase the required percentage of change in ownership and to require the occurrence of the applicable change in control event, rather than just stockholder approval of such event.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event Mr. Considines employment is terminated without cause by Aimco, by Mr. Considine for good reason, or for reason of disability, Mr. Considine will be entitled to: a lump sum cash payment equal to two times the sum of his base salary at the time of termination and $1.65 million, subject to certain reductions, including a reduction of the sum by 1/24 for each complete month of employment following his attainment of age 68; the amount of any STI earned but unpaid for the fiscal year preceding the termination date; a pro-rata portion of a $1.65 million STI amount for the fiscal year in which the termination occurs; continued medical coverage at Aimcos expense until the earlier of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) eighteen months following the date of termination, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) Mr. Considine becoming eligible for coverage under the medical plans of a subsequent employer, provided that in the event Mr. Considines medical coverage terminates pursuant to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a), he will be entitled to a lump sum payment equal to six times the monthly COBRA premium then in effect; and immediate and full acceleration of any unvested stock awards and outstanding unvested stock options, with all outstanding stock options (along with all options already vested) remaining exercisable until the earliest to occur of the fifth anniversary of the date of termination or the expiration of the applicable option term.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of Mr. Considines disability, the lump sum cash payment described above shall be offset by any long-term disability benefits received under Aimcos long-term disability insurance plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of Mr. Considines death, Aimco will pay or provide to Mr. Considines estate the amount of any STI earned but unpaid for the prior fiscal year, and all equity-based and other long-term incentive awards granted to Mr. Considine will become immediately fully vested and payable, as applicable, and all outstanding stock option awards will remain exercisable until the earliest to occur of the fifth anniversary of the date of termination or the expiration of the applicable option term.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the employment agreement, in the event payments to Mr. Considine are subject to the excise tax imposed by Section 4999 of the Code, Mr. Considine is entitled to receive a limited gross-up payment, subject to a maximum of $5 million.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If covered payments are less than 10% over the permitted limit, Mr. Considine is required to reduce his payments to avoid triggering a gross-up payment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Double Trigger Vesting Upon Change in Control
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beginning with the equity grants made in 2015 for compensation year 2014, the restricted stock and stock option agreements pursuant to which restricted stock and/or stock option awards have been made to Messrs. Considine, Beldin, Bezzant and Kimmel and Ms. Cohn provide that upon a change in control, all outstanding
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: shares of restricted stock shall not become immediately and fully vested and all unvested stock options shall not become immediately and fully vested and remain exercisable (along with all options already vested) for the remainder of the term of the option unless there is also a subsequent termination of employment of the executive officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimcos LTI plan provides that performance shares will vest based on the higher of actual or target TSR performance through the truncated performance period ending on the date of the change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accelerated Vesting upon Termination of Employment Due to Death or Disability
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As set forth above, in the event Mr. Considines employment is terminated for reason of disability, Mr. Considine will be entitled to immediate and full acceleration of any unvested stock awards and outstanding unvested stock options, with all outstanding stock options (along with all options already vested) remaining exercisable until the earliest to occur of the fifth anniversary of the date of termination or the expiration of the applicable option term.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of Mr. Considines death, all equity-based and other LTI awards granted to Mr. Considine will become immediately fully vested and payable, as applicable, and all outstanding stock option awards will remain exercisable until the earliest to occur of the fifth anniversary of the date of termination or the expiration of the applicable option term.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The restricted stock and stock option agreements pursuant to which restricted stock and/or stock option awards have been made to Messrs. Beldin, Bezzant and Kimmel and Ms. Cohn provide that upon termination of employment due to death or disability, all outstanding shares of restricted stock become immediately and fully vested and all unvested stock options become immediately and fully vested and remain exercisable (along with all options already vested) for the remainder of the term of the option.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, Aimcos LTI plan provides that performance shares will vest based on the higher of actual or target TSR performance through the truncated performance period ending on the date of death or disability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-Competition and Non-Solicitation Agreements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective in January 2002 for Mr. Considine, and in connection with their employment and/or promotions by Aimco for Messrs. Beldin, Bezzant and Kimmel and Ms. Cohn, Aimco entered into certain non-competition and non-solicitation agreements with each executive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Considines 2002 non-competition and non-solicitation agreement was replaced by his December 2008 employment agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to the agreements, each of these NEOs agreed that during the term of his or her employment with the Company and for a period of two years following the termination of his or her employment, except in circumstances where there was a change in control of the Company, he or she could not
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) be employed by a competitor of the Company named on a schedule to the agreement,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) solicit other employees to leave the Companys employment, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) solicit customers of Aimco to terminate their relationship with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The agreements further required that the NEOs protect Aimcos trade secrets and confidential information.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For Messrs. Beldin, Bezzant and Kimmel and Ms. Cohn, the agreements provide that in order to enforce the above-noted non-competition condition following the executives termination of employment by the Company without cause, each such executive will receive, for a period not to extend beyond the earlier of 24 months following such termination or the date of acceptance of employment with a non-competitor,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) severance pay in an amount, if any, to be determined by the Company in its sole discretion and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) a monthly payment equal to two-thirds (2/3) of such executives monthly base salary at the time of termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of these agreements, cause is defined to mean, among other things, the executives
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CERTAIN RELATIONSHIPS AND RELATED TRANSACTIONS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Policies and Procedures for Review, Approval or Ratification of Related Person Transactions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aimco recognizes that related person transactions can present potential or actual conflicts of interest and create the appearance that Aimcos decisions are based on considerations other than the best interests of Aimco and its stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, as a general matter, it is Aimcos preference to avoid related person transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nevertheless, Aimco recognizes that there are situations where related person transactions may be in, or may not be inconsistent with, the best interests of Aimco and its stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee, pursuant to a written policy approved by the Board, has oversight for related person transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee will review transactions, arrangements or relationships in which (1) the aggregate amount involved will or may be expected to exceed $100,000 in any calendar year, (2) Aimco (or any Aimco entity) is a participant, and (3) any related party has or will have a direct or indirect interest (other than an interest arising solely as a result of being a director of another corporation or organization that is a party to the transaction or a less than 10 percent beneficial owner of another entity that is a party to the transaction).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee has also given its standing approval for certain types of related person transactions such as certain employment arrangements, director compensation, transactions with another entity in which a related persons interest is only by virtue of a
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: non-executive employment relationship or limited equity position, and transactions in which all stockholders receive pro rata benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since the beginning of 2016, there were no related person transactions that required review under the policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: OTHER MATTERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 16(a) Beneficial Ownership Reporting Compliance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 16(a) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, requires Aimcos executive officers and directors, and persons who own more than ten percent of a registered class of Aimcos equity securities, to file reports (Forms 3, 4 and 5) of stock ownership and changes in ownership with the SEC and the New York Stock Exchange.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive officers, directors and beneficial owners of more than ten percent of Aimcos registered equity securities are required by SEC regulations to furnish Aimco with copies of all such forms that they file.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based solely on Aimcos review of the copies of Forms 3, 4 and 5 and the amendments thereto received by it for the year ended December 31, 2016, or written representations from certain reporting persons that no Forms 5 were required to be filed by those persons, Aimco believes that during the period ended December 31, 2016, all filing requirements were complied with by its executive officers and directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders Proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposals of stockholders intended to be presented at Aimcos Annual Meeting of Stockholders to be held in 2018 must be received by Aimco, marked to the attention of the Corporate Secretary, no later than November 14, 2017, to be included in Aimcos proxy statement and form of proxy for that meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposals must comply with the requirements as to form and substance established by the SEC for proposals in order to be included in the proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominations for directors pursuant to proxy access provided for in the Companys bylaws must adhere to the terms of the bylaws and will be considered untimely if received by the Company before October 15, 2017, or after November 14, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposals of stockholders submitted to Aimco for consideration at Aimcos annual meeting of stockholders to be held in 2018 outside the processes of Rule 14a-8 (i.e., the procedures for placing a stockholders proposal in Aimcos proxy materials) will be considered untimely if received by the Company before December 26, 2017, or after January 25, 2018.
